snippet: Ten owners and more than 20 players met for nearly five hours on Friday as the parties began a last-minute push to broker a deal before endangering regular-season games.
lead_paragraph: Ten owners and more than 20 players met for nearly five hours on Friday as the parties began a last-minute push to broker a deal before endangering regular-season games.

headline.main: Another Day Passes Without N.B.A. Deal
headline.print_headline: Another Day Passes Without N.B.A. Deal
headline.seo: Another Day Passes Without N.B.A. Deal
